trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of registration to perform for a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> registration.
trans-unit.target: 指定要进行注册的类型<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>或<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>注册。

trans-unit.source: Registering an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> enables it to receive <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> invitation requests.
trans-unit.target: 注册<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>使它能够接收<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>邀请请求。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: The service or application performing the registration must have permission to do so, as it requires access to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> and other resources like users, applications, and services on the remote machine.
trans-unit.target: 服务或执行注册的应用程序必须有权这样做，因为它需要访问<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>和其他资源，如用户、 应用程序和远程计算机上的服务。</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> is being registered for all peers of the application host
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref>要注册的应用程序主机的所有对等节点

trans-unit.source: The application or object is being registered only for the user associated with the calling peer
trans-unit.target: 仅为与调用的对等方关联的用户注册的应用程序或对象
